title: [Large-Scale] Strategic Use of Explanation-Eliciting Prompting Effects in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Application of explanation-eliciting techniques to maximize short-term learning outcomes in mobile environments for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reconstruct core concepts at 80% or higher accuracy using scaffolding prompts provided during video viewing
Learners can analyze complex social phenomena from three or more perspectives by applying self-explanation prompting
Learners can develop plans to apply self-explanation prompting to workplace problem-solving at least twice within three months based on prior experience
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
